analysis.description:
MatreXaCrowdsale.MatreXaCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/34/0xf8da85cc83fe074d69f5e15ad70e439b725450a2.sol#574-608) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mtrx.mint(owner,_ownerTokens) (/unique_chucks/34/0xf8da85cc83fe074d69f5e15ad70e439b725450a2.sol#607-608)

MatreXaCrowdsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/34/0xf8da85cc83fe074d69f5e15ad70e439b725450a2.sol#629-648) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mtrx.mint(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/34/0xf8da85cc83fe074d69f5e15ad70e439b725450a2.sol#643-644)
